title: Coherence, chi, and wisdom-energy w/Jordan Hall and Gregg Henriques - Voices with Vervaeke
description:
Jordan, Gregg and I discuss the double aspect nature of coherence, on one hand it alludes to logical coherence and the other it alludes to something physical such as electromagnetic coherence.  We partake in  dia logos ( discuss and aspire to exemplify) what this wisdom-energy is like and how it is relevant to the Taoist notion of chi/qi  and the new biological notion from theoretical biologists such as Wagner of Gilbert of evolvablity, which is not the evolution of a morphology but of a species'  capacity for evolving to a dynamically demanding environment. 

Jordan' channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/jordangreenhall
Gregg's web page:  https://www.gregghenriques.com/
